column4: How do i fix this issue with apt-get? "trying to overwrite `/usr/share/zoneinfo/Canada/Atlantic', which is also in package locales"
what are you installing, and what version of ubuntu?
was trying to install libapache2-fastcgi, did a full upgrade, and it was trying to install tzdata_2007b-1_all.deb
try sudo aptitude install tzdata locales
same error.  not going away.
a sec
what version of ubuntu are your running, you said you did a full upgrade? Was that from one version to another?
check your PMs
don't see it, you have to be registered with freenode to send pms
o ok.
http://pastebin.com/d6eee9eef
you have several issues, but to start, make sure you have no sources other than ubuntu ones installed. Then run sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
i can't do dist-upgrade till i fix the issue with tzdata affecting apt-get
true, doh
sudo dpkg -i --force-overwrite /var/cache/apt/archives/tzdata<tab>
did you just do an upgrade from one version to another?
oh, did you read what I said about repositories other than ubuntu above? REMOVE them, apt-get update, and try again
yes i did.
ok, and dpkg -i is one of the fundamental commands, used it many times
woops my bad
you probably still have some mixed debian packages in your system, the origins button in synaptic will let you check
